よし、全員準備はいいな？\nこれより帰還作戦を再開する。:
All right, everyone ready?
We will now resume the return operation.
七彩とちゆるは機体を自律モードにしておけ。\n今のお前達が操縦するよりは百倍マシ:
Shichisai and Chiyuru, set the machine to autopilot mode.
It's a hundred times better than you guys piloting it right now.
ほんと、この程度で……自分が情けありませんわ……: Seriously, this is enough to make me feel pathetic...
無理だけはしないでくださいね。\n今のおふたりはＭＧに乗る事すら負担になりかねま:
Please don't push yourself too hard.
The two of you could be a burden to even ride MGs right now.
めるの言う通りだ。大人しくＭＧに揺られておけ。: It's just as I said. Be a good boy and let MG shake you.
とはいえ、地上まではそう遠くはないはずだ。マップが正しければ、\n次の<r=ホー:
That said, it shouldn't be too far to the surface. If the map is correct,
If we pass through the next <r-hole> hall, we should be able to return to the depth we were originally exploring.
どんなにやばいやつが出てきても\nラミがぶっ倒してあげるから、大丈夫。:
No matter how dangerous someone comes out
Rami will beat you down, so don't worry.
もしラミが突破されても、わたしとめるでみんなを守る。: Even if Rami breaks through, I'll stop her and protect everyone.
いや、その前に助けに来いよ！？: No, come save me first, okay?!
ったく……まだ<r=ホール>広間</r>すら見えてないのに\n無駄な体力使わせん:
Geez... I can't even see the <r-hole> hall yet.
Don't make me waste my energy.
<r=ホール>広間</r>まではそうかからないでしょうから、\n気を引き締めてい:
It won't be that long until the <r-hole> hall <r>, so...
Let's keep our guard up...!
それじゃあ、ラミを先頭に、白奈とめるがその後ろに。\n俺は七彩とちゆるの後ろから:
Well then, with Rami in the lead, Shirona and Tome are behind them.
I keep an eye on the area from behind Shichika and Chiyuru. Let's go.
今のところはレーダーに敵の反応はない。辺りもいたって静かだ。\nこのまま何事もな:
There's no sign of any enemies on the radar right now. It's quiet all around.
I hope we can make it to the surface without any trouble...
……って。まあ、そう上手くはいかないよな。: ...Wait. Well, it's not going to go that well.
少し先からメイズシフターの反応がある。\nおそらく<r=ホール>広間</r>だ。:
Mayse-Sifter reacts from a short distance ahead.
It was probably a <r-hole> hall.
……いや、範囲が広くて正確な数まではわからない。\n目視で確かめた方が早いかもし:
...No, the range is so wide that I can't tell the exact number.
It might be faster to see it with your own eyes.
了解。じゃ、ラミが見てくるよ。\nみんなここで待ってて。絶対に動かないでよ！:
Understood. I'll go take a look, Rami.
Wait here, everyone. Don't move!
戦うんじゃなくて様子を見てくるだけだっての！\n……いってくる。:
I'm just going to check on you, not fight!
...I'm going.
しばらくして、偵察を終えたラミが戻ってきた。: A short while later, Rami returned, having finished scouting.
最悪も最悪。メイズシフターの群れが広間〈ホール〉を埋め尽くしてた。\nもう数える:
Worst-case scenario, too. A swarm of maise shifters filled the hall.
So much so that it's almost stupid to even count them...
しかも、狂暴な奴等ばっかりだった。\nあれはＭＧを見つけるなり攻撃してくるタイプ:
What's more, they were all rabid.
That's the type that attacks whenever they see MGs.
……で、どうするの？: ...So, what are you going to do?
……ここを迂回して、別のルートから地上を目指せると思うか？: ...Do you think we can take a detour around here and aim for the surface from a different route?
燃料がどう考えても足りません……: No matter how you look at it, we don't have enough fuel...
だよな……\nここで待機して救援を待つ時間の猶予は？:
You're right...
What time do we have to wait here and wait for help?
ない。ちゆると七彩のことを考えると、数時間以内には地上に出たい。: No. When I think about Nanasai, I want to get to the surface within a few hours.
……よし。ならば、もうこれしかないな。\n俺達は……敵中を突破し、地上を目指す。:
...All right. In that case, this is our only option.
We... break through the enemy and head for the ground.
ほ、本気ですか！？\nいくら補給したとはいえ、弾薬にも限りが……:
A-Are you serious?!
I may have resupplied, but my ammunition is limited...
める。%usernameusernameuserna%の言う通りにした方がいい。:
I'll do it. %usernameusernameuserna% should do as she says.
Of all the choices we've been given, it's the best.
そうかもしれませんが、あの数とどう戦うんですか？\n正面きっての戦闘ではさすがに:
That may be true, but how are we going to fight those numbers?
In a head-on fight, we don't stand a chance...
大丈夫。ラミが陽動するから。: Don't worry. Rami will create a diversion.
一応確認しておくが、責任を感じているからじゃないよな？: Just to be sure, it's not because you feel responsible, is it?
違うっつの。弟や妹達のためだし。\nそれに、%usernameusernameu:
That's not it. It's for my brothers and sisters.
Plus, I have a date with %user name, username, and %userna.
ラミ……わかった。じゃあデートプランはちゃんと考えておくよ。: Rami... All right. I'll think of a date plan, then.
ラミが敵の気を引いている間に、めるを先頭にして敵に突撃。\n白奈の攻撃で突破口を:
While Rami is drawing the enemy's attention, Meru takes the lead and charges the enemy.
Shirona's attack makes a breakthrough. Shichika and Chiyuru follow suit.
わかりやすくていいじゃん。: It's nice that it's easy to understand.
わたしは自分にできることをするだけ。: I'll just do what I can.
絶対に地上へ帰還し、未調査エリアの情報を持ち帰ろう。\nそして、柊校舎の伝説にな:
Let's definitely return to the surface and bring back information about unexplored areas.
And let's become the legend of the Hiiragi building.
